rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading into a combined living room area that maximizes natural light with large windows facing the courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area with access to an open kitchen; utilizes sliding glass doors to enhance ventilation and allow for connection with the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian design kitchen with ample counter space and integrated appliances. Open-plan layout enhances light and air flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Private master suite located on the ground floor with its own ensuite bathroom; large windows to invite natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest bedroom positioned near living area with direct views towards the courtyard.

rooms.name: Study Room / Office
rooms.description: Quiet work space integrated into the living zone; oriented to maximize daylight.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact yet comfortable living quarters for domestic help with access to a small balcony ensuring natural ventilation.

openings.location: Living Room, Master Bedroom, Guest Bedroom, Study Room
Between Living Room and Dining Area
